title: Seven Wonders of the Modern World
description: Seven Wonders of the Modern World is an informational book that describes seven remarkable structures made by humans. Readers will learn why the structures were built and why each has been designated a "wonder." Photographs and illustrations support the informative text
meta: engineers, hydroelectric plant, landmark, observation deck, power plant, radio and television signals, scholars, shipping industry, skyline, suspension bridge, waterway, wildlife habitats
Use the reading strategy of summarizing to understand and remember informational text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main ideas and details
Capitalization : Capitalize place names and other proper nouns
Content Vocabulary : Identify syllable division in content vocabulary

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
